name: Dragon Master
description:
With the Dragon Master game, 1 to 4 players can go head-to-head against each other taking down dragons left and right, scoring as many points as possible! This simple concept is offset by fast, exciting gameplay that demands quick thinking, skill and co-ordination.

The game controls and gameplay concept are simple but very action-packed. Dragon Master boasts 20 different dragons to take down as well as 3 challenging bosses. Take down dragons, win games, and fight off the 3 bosses to complete stages!
